verses.name: Titus 2:1
verses.text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:

verses.name: Titus 2:2
verses.text: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.

verses.name: Titus 2:3
verses.text: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;

verses.name: Titus 2:4
verses.text: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,

verses.name: Titus 2:5
verses.text: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.

verses.name: Titus 2:6
verses.text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.
